steps.title: Get a group of 8-30 people and sit in a circle.
steps.content: Get a group of 8-30 people and sit in a circle.

steps.title: Get a moderately slow beat going by slapping your thighs and then clapping.
steps.content: Get a moderately slow beat going by slapping your thighs and then clapping.

steps.title: Have the leader bunny say "Who's got the bunny?"
steps.content: Have the leader bunny say "Who's got the bunny?"

steps.title: Have rest of the people in the circle go "You've got the bunny!"
steps.content: Have rest of the people in the circle go "You've got the bunny!"

steps.title: Have the leader bunny make a mouth shape with their hand, points at them self, and opens and closes it while saying "bunny, bunny".
steps.content: Have the leader bunny make a mouth shape with their hand, points at them self, and opens and closes it while saying "bunny, bunny". Then they go "bunny, bunny" again, but pointing at another person in the circle.

steps.title: Have the person that was pointed at then repeat step 5, except the people on the left and right sides of them roll their fists and go "Ooga, ooga, ooga, ooga"
steps.content: Have the person that was pointed at then repeat step 5, except the people on the left and right sides of them roll their fists and go "Ooga, ooga, ooga, ooga"

steps.title: Repeat until someone makes a mistake.
steps.content: Repeat until someone makes a mistake. If someone makes a mistake(such as forgetting to "ooga", not staying with the beat, etc) then that person is removed from the circle.
